name: Dill Veggie Tuna Salad
author: Lilah Vidlund
summary: Perfect for summer, this tuna salad is delicious!  It's a crowd pleaser, easy to multiply and perfect for potlucks or cook-outs.
ingredients: ½ cup small pasta shells, uncooked
1 (5 ounce) can water-packed tuna, drained and flaked
directions: Fill a pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil
Once the water is boiling, stir in the shell pasta, and return to a boil
Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, about 13 minutes
Drain well in a colander set in the sink, and chill by rinsing with cold water
Combine the cooled pasta, tuna, tomato, cucumber, red bell pepper, green onions, and celery in a salad bowl, and toss lightly to mix
Stir in the ranch dressing and dill, cover, and refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour
